attributes.action: Make it illegal  to open a vets unless you are a fully qualified vet
attributes.additional_details: The government has the authority to create a law that states ONLY qualified vets are legally allowed to open vet services - there are horrific fraudulent practices opening up across the county creating harm to animals in the drugs they administer and this must become a priority and be stopped in its tracks
attributes.background: At present there are no laws requiring people that open vets to actually fully qualified vets themselves- This is the reason we see so many vets opening up administering drugs and worse fertility treatments to our pets when they are not even qualified or legally trained

rejection.details:
Only veterinary surgeons registered with the Royal College of Veterinary Surgeons can practise veterinary medicine in the UK.

You can find out more about registration of veterinary surgeons here: https://www.rcvs.org.uk/registration/
